messages.title: Just look what the Tories would do if they were governing alone...
messages.content: PAYING LOCAL NURSES AND TEACHERS LESS THAN IN LONDON; LETTING BOSSES FIRE STAFF FOR NO REASON; CUTTING PUBLIC SERVICES DEEPER AND FASTER; ALLOWING COMPANIES TO TAKE OVER SCHOOLS AND RUN THEM FOR PROFIT

messages.title: Don’t let them get away with it
messages.content: Only the local Lib Dem team can stop Tory cuts to education, care homes and police.

messages.title: Just look at the facts...
messages.content: Labour have always finished a distant third here in Taunton Deane, behind the Conservatives and the Lib Dems. The bookies agree that only the Tories or the Lib Dems can win. Labour are massive 100/1 outsiders. Labour only have 3 district councillors out of a possible 56! Labour cannot win here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Preventing cuts to education, care homes, and police services.
Jeremy has strongly supported Musgrove Park Hospital, notably the new Surgical Building opened this year.

mentions.candidate: Jeremy Browne MP and the Lib Dems
mentions.tacticalSituation: Taunton Deane constituency is a top target for the Conservatives at next year's General Election. If the Tories win this seat they might govern alone, which means a severe scaling back of public services. Only the LD Dems can beat the Tories here to stop damaging cuts to education, care homes and police services.

issues.education: Lib Dems can stop Tory cuts to education.
issues.health: Jeremy has strongly supported Musgrove Park Hospital.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has been working hard for everyone across Taunton Deane, in government and locally. Helped secure funding for the new surgical building at Musgrove Park Hospital.

images.caption: Images depicting possible negative outcomes of Tory governance such as cutting public services and paying local nurses and teachers less than in London.
Bar chart illustrating past election results in Taunton Deane showing Lib Dems 49%, Conservatives 42%, Labour 5%.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes that voting for Labour would be ineffective in preventing Conservative victory in Taunton Deane, highlighting that only the Lib Dems or Tories can win here.
